006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.TypeSystem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Collections;
022import java.util.EnumSet;
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.Set;
027import java.util.stream.Stream;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
031
032/**
033 * Provides a concrete implementation of a function call executor.
034 */
035public class DefaultFunction
036    extends AbstractFunction {
037  // private static final Logger logger =
038  // LogManager.getLogger(AbstractFunction.class);
039
040  @NonNull
041  private final Set<FunctionProperty> properties;
042  @NonNull
043  private final ISequenceType result;
044  @NonNull
045  private final IFunctionExecutor handler;
046
047  /**
048   * Construct a new function signature.
049   *
050   * @param name
051   *          the name of the function
052   * @param properties
053   *          the characteristics of the function
054   * @param arguments
055   *          the argument signatures or an empty list
056   * @param result
057   *          the type of the result
058   * @param handler
059   *          the handler to call to execute the function
060   */
061  @SuppressWarnings({ "null", "PMD.LooseCoupling" })
062  DefaultFunction(
063      @NonNull String name,
064      @NonNull String namespace,
065      @NonNull EnumSet<FunctionProperty> properties,
066      @NonNull List<IArgument> arguments,
067      @NonNull ISequenceType result,
068      @NonNull IFunctionExecutor handler) {
069    super(name, namespace, arguments);
070    this.properties = Collections.unmodifiableSet(properties);
071    this.result = result;
072    this.handler = handler;
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  public Set<FunctionProperty> getProperties() {
077    return properties;
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  public ISequenceType getResult() {
082    return result;
083  }
084  //
085  // @Override
086  // public boolean isSupported(List<IExpression<?>> expressionArguments) {
087  // boolean retval;
088  // if (expressionArguments.isEmpty() && getArguments().isEmpty()) {
089  // // no arguments
090  // retval = true;

092  // // // the context item will be the argument
093  // // // TODO: check the context item for type compatibility
094  // // retval = true;
095  // } else if ((expressionArguments.size() == getArguments().size())
096  // || (isArityUnbounded() && expressionArguments.size() >
097  // getArguments().size())) {

100  // Iterator<IArgument> argumentIterator = getArguments().iterator();
101  // Iterator<IExpression<?>> expressionIterator = expressionArguments.iterator();
102  //

117  // arguments are optional

147
148  /**
149   * Converts arguments in an attempt to align with the function's signature.
150   *
151   * @param function
152   *          the function
153   * @param parameters
154   *          the argument parameters
155   * @return the converted argument list
156   */
157  @NonNull
158  public static List<ISequence<?>> convertArguments(
159      @NonNull IFunction function,
160      @NonNull List<? extends ISequence<?>> parameters) {
161    @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> retval = new ArrayList<>(parameters.size());
162
163    Iterator<IArgument> argumentIterator = function.getArguments().iterator();
164    IArgument argument = null;
165    for (ISequence<?> parameter : parameters) {
166      if (argumentIterator.hasNext()) {
167        argument = argumentIterator.next();
168      } else if (!function.isArityUnbounded()) {
169        throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
170            null,
171            String.format("argument signature doesn't match '%s'", function.toSignature()));
172      }
173
174      assert argument != null;
175      assert parameter != null;
176
177      retval.add(convertArgument(argument, parameter));
178    }
179    return retval;
180  }
181
182  @NonNull
183  private static ISequence<?> convertArgument(
184      @NonNull IArgument argument,
185      @NonNull ISequence<?> parameter) {
186    // apply occurrence
187    ISequence<?> retval = argument.getSequenceType().getOccurrence().getSequenceHandler().handle(parameter);
188
189    // apply function conversion and type promotion to the parameter
190    if (!retval.isEmpty()) {
191      retval = convertSequence(argument, retval);
192
193      // verify resulting values
194      Class<? extends IItem> argumentClass = argument.getSequenceType().getType();
195      for (IItem item : retval.getValue()) {
196        Class<? extends IItem> itemClass = item.getClass();
197        if (!argumentClass.isAssignableFrom(itemClass)) {
198          throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
199              item,
200              String.format("The type '%s' is not a subtype of '%s'",
201                  TypeSystem.getName(itemClass),
202                  TypeSystem.getName(argumentClass)));
203        }
204      }
205    }
206    return retval;
207  }
208
209  /**
210   * Based on XPath 3.1
211   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-function-conversion">function
212   * conversion</a> rules.
213   *
214   * @param argument
215   *          the function argument signature details
216   * @param sequence
217   *          the sequence to convert
218   * @return the converted sequence
219   */
220  @NonNull
221  protected static ISequence<?> convertSequence(@NonNull IArgument argument, @NonNull ISequence<?> sequence) {
222    ISequenceType requiredSequenceType = argument.getSequenceType();
223    Class<? extends IItem> requiredSequenceTypeClass = requiredSequenceType.getType();
224
225    Stream<? extends IItem> stream = sequence.safeStream();
226
227    if (IAnyAtomicItem.class.isAssignableFrom(requiredSequenceTypeClass)) {
228      Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> atomicStream = stream.flatMap(FnData::atomize);
229
230      // if (IUntypedAtomicItem.class.isInstance(item)) { // NOPMD
231      // // TODO: apply cast to atomic type
232      // }
233
234      if (IStringItem.class.equals(requiredSequenceTypeClass)) {
235        // promote URIs to strings if a string is required
236        atomicStream = atomicStream.map(item -> IAnyUriItem.class.isInstance(item) ? IStringItem.cast(item) : item);
237      }
238
239      stream = atomicStream;
240    }
241
242    stream = stream.peek(item -> {
243      if (!requiredSequenceTypeClass.isInstance(item)) {
244        throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
245            item,
246            String.format("The type '%s' is not a subtype of '%s'",
247                item.getClass().getName(),
248                requiredSequenceTypeClass.getName()));
249      }
250    });
251    assert stream != null;
252
253    return ISequence.of(stream);
254  }
255
256  private IItem getContextItem(@NonNull ISequence<?> focus) {
257    IItem contextItem = null;
258    if (isFocusDepenent()) {
259      contextItem = focus.getFirstItem(true);
260      if (contextItem == null) {
261        throw new DynamicMetapathException(DynamicMetapathException.DYNAMIC_CONTEXT_ABSENT, "The context is empty");
262      }
263    }
264    return contextItem;
265  }
266
267  @Override
268  public ISequence<?> execute(
269      @NonNull List<? extends ISequence<?>> arguments,
270      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
271      @NonNull ISequence<?> focus) {
272
273    try {
274      IItem contextItem = getContextItem(focus);
275
276      List<ISequence<?>> convertedArguments = convertArguments(this, arguments);
277
278      CallingContext callingContext = null;
279      ISequence<?> result = null;
280      if (isDeterministic()) {
281        // check cache
282        callingContext = new CallingContext(convertedArguments, contextItem);
283        // TODO: implement something like computeIfAbsent
284        // attempt to get the result from the cache
285        result = dynamicContext.getCachedResult(callingContext);
286      }
287
288      if (result == null) {
289        result = handler.execute(this, convertedArguments, dynamicContext, contextItem);
290
291        if (callingContext != null) {
292          // add result to cache
293          dynamicContext.cacheResult(callingContext, result);
294        }
295      }
296
297      // logger.info(String.format("Executed function '%s' with arguments '%s'
298      // producing result '%s'",
299      // toSignature(), convertedArguments.toString(), result.asList().toString()));
300      return result;
301    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
302      throw new MetapathException(String.format("Unable to execute function '%s'", toSignature()), ex);
303    }
304  }
305
306  @Override
307  public int hashCode() {
308    return Objects.hash(getQName(), getArguments(), handler, properties, result);
309  }
310
311  @Override
312  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
313    if (this == obj) {
314      return true; // NOPMD - readability
315    }
316    if ((obj == null) || (getClass() != obj.getClass())) {
317      return false; // NOPMD - readability
318    }
319    DefaultFunction other = (DefaultFunction) obj;
320    return Objects.equals(getQName(), other.getQName())
321        && Objects.equals(getArguments(), other.getArguments())
322        && Objects.equals(handler, other.handler)
323        && Objects.equals(properties, other.properties)
324        && Objects.equals(result, other.result);
325  }
326
327  @Override
328  public String toString() {
329    return toSignature();
330  }
331
332  public final class CallingContext {
333    @Nullable
334    private final IItem contextItem;
335    @NonNull
336    private final List<ISequence<?>> arguments;
337
338    /**
339     * Set up the execution context for this function.
340     *
341     * @param arguments
342     *          the function arguments
343     * @param contextItem
344     *          the current node context
345     */
346    private CallingContext(@NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @Nullable IItem contextItem) {
347      this.contextItem = contextItem;
348      this.arguments = arguments;
349    }
350
351    /**
352     * Get the function instance associated with the calling context.
353     *
354     * @return the function instance
355     */
356    @NonNull
357    public DefaultFunction getFunction() {
358      return DefaultFunction.this;
359    }
360
361    /**
362     * Get the node item focus associated with the calling context.
363     *
364     * @return the function instance
365     */
366    @Nullable
367    public IItem getContextItem() {
368      return contextItem;
369    }
370
371    /**
372     * Get the arguments associated with the calling context.
373     *
374     * @return the arguments
375     */
376    @NonNull
377    public List<ISequence<?>> getArguments() {
378      return arguments;
379    }
380
381    @Override
382    public int hashCode() {
383      final int prime = 31;
384      int result = 1;
385      result = prime * result + getFunction().hashCode();
386      return prime * result + Objects.hash(contextItem, arguments);
387    }
388
389    @Override
390    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
391      if (this == obj) {
392        return true; // NOPMD - readability
393      }
394      if ((obj == null) || (getClass() != obj.getClass())) {
395        return false; // NOPMD - readability
396      }
397      CallingContext other = (CallingContext) obj;
398      if (!getFunction().equals(other.getFunction())) {
399        return false; // NOPMD - readability
400      }
401      return Objects.equals(arguments, other.arguments) && Objects.equals(contextItem, other.contextItem);
402    }
403  }
404}
